Ho-Oh (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0249: Lugia
Pokémon
#0251: Celebi →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Ho-Oh (TCG Pocket).

Ho-Oh has been featured on 24 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Revelation expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Ho-Oh cards are normally Fire-type or Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Ho-Oh

Ho-Oh
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
